Currently, I'm living in Ukraine,
and my city is Sumy

Howdy, I'm Misha - a designer and developer that sleeps and sees how to
create a quality product that helps people.

I was born and raised in Ukraine, Sumy. Since childhood, when I got a
computer, I immediately downloaded Photoshop and began to try to do
something of my own. After a while, I became interested in writing code. I
also liked this field. And after that, I realized that I like these two fields.
And it just so happened that I began to devote less time to this, but
sometimes I returned to this to do little projects. After a certain amount of
time, I began more to dedicate myself to this cause, and It became my job.

Being a sophomore, I began to understand as digital products affect our
life. Daily We use products of different nature, it is maybe grocery
applications, CRM platforms, etc. But more amount of products have one
goal - to help and to do easily our lives.

Outside of work, I spend time with my family and friends. Currently, my
work is time-consuming, and I try to spend it right.

I'm always down for new offers if I will have the time. Reach out and let's
chat!
